original_text: And Joshua said, “Alas, O Lord God, why have you brought this people over the Jordan at all, to give us into the hands of the Amorites, to destroy us? Would that we had been content to dwell beyond the Jordan!
korean_text: 이르되 슬프도소이다 주 여호와여 어찌하여 이 백성을 인도하여 요단을 건너게 하시고 우리를 아모리 사람의 손에 넘겨 멸망시키려 하셨나이까 우리가 요단 저쪽을 만족하게 여겨 거주하였더면 좋을 뻔하였나이다

sentences.original_text: why have you brought this people over the Jordan at all,
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 이 백성을 요단 강 건너로 인도하셨나이까,

sentences.original_text: to give us into the hands of the Amorites,
Would that we had been content
